entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What are these ThreadPoolAdjustment event means #77622
  • System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource: Activity with null operation name #77621
    8.0.0
  • Update global.json default SDK roll-forward behaviour #77614
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: stackalloc inside ref struct #77613
  • X509Certificate2 Issue in MAUI Project on M1 Macbook #77611
  • [API Proposal]: Proxy for HttpClient #77608
  • ILCompiler projects are causing source-build prebuilts #77601
  • Full GC never execute on Serve GC #77592
  • Cannot export certificate data even with X509KeyStorageFlags.Exportable #77590
  • [mono] mono crash on struct copy #77588
  • Implement hot/cold code splitting #77583
    8.0.0
  • CopySign is slow #77579
    Future

Closed

  • Two subsequent build.sh runs produce error #62918
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Failed to load SQLitePCLRaw.core #77476
  • es-ES Culture (and possibly others) Incorrectly (I think?) format AMDesignator/PMDesignator #77585
  • The mscordbi.dll 6.0.922.42201 is missing from symbol servers. #75747
    Future
  • DotNet 7 Regression when reading large Zip files #77159
    7.0.0
  • EndSilenceTimeout and EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous for SpeechRecognitionEngine is 10 seconds instead of 100 seconds #77598
  • Blazor WASM integrity check failed behind corporate proxy (Zscaller) #77602
  • Segmentation fault when using globalization and entity framework on alpine 3.16 #77596
  • JsonNode is not thread safe #77421
    8.0.0
  • osr stress arm64 - coreclr_initialize failed #77066
    8.0.0
  • CultureInfo - Difference In Behaviour Between Windows 10 And WSL #77591
  • Compressed Request doesn't work in .NET 6 but it is ok in .Net Core 2.2 #77586
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Add support for rematerialization #6264
    Future
  • JsonConverter.Read/WriteAsPropertyName methods throw NotSupportedException when invoked in built-in converters #77326
    8.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Allow `TimeOnly` as Dictionary key #77566
    8.0.0
  • Can't load managed library in natively hosted .NET runtime #77587
  • PAX GEA constructor setting the name value to the unformatted string #77555
    8.0.0
  • Win32 Access Violation in EnterCriticalSection when application exits that has multiple mixed mode managed .dlls in .NET runtime inside trace.cpp trace::flush #75760
    8.0.0
  • Long running test: ReadAsync_CancelPendingTask_ThrowsCancellationException and ReadAsync_CancelPendingValueTask_ThrowsCancellationException #72586
    Future
  • CustomAttributeDecoder should cache and reuse common arguments to avoid boxing #16551
    Future
  • Handle projections for TypeSpecs in ResolveSignatureTypeKind #17146
    Future
  • System.Reflection.Metadata.Decoding.Tests.CustomAttributeDecoderTests.TestCustomAttributeDecoder is failed if tc is a native image file #23513
    Future
  • [Reflection] typeof vs Type.GetType: return different result of .netfx and .net core #24479
    Future
  • StackOverflow in error handling under low memory conditions #24823
    Future
  • Consider providing an API to build the SequencePoint blob in MethodDebugInformation #27075
    Future
  • .NET 5. Built-in DI -> Injectable Attributes #Discussion #29497
    Future
  • System.Xaml FileNotFoundException when using XmlnsPrefix and .resx in a referenced assembly #804
    Future
  • Undefined references when linking with libnethost.a #69306
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Never send messages from our internal protocol extensions to the browser #77620
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Never send messages from our internal protocol extensions to the browser #77619
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Never send messages from our internal protocol extensions to the browser #77616
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use SR.Format in a few more places #77615
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    area-System.IO
  • Fix source-build prebuilts introduced by analyzers #77607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77605
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Stop propagating BBF_SPLIT_FLAGS from inlinee's parent #77600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fold bound checks for static readonly arrays/strings #77593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Binding with IDictionary<,> implementer types #77582
    regression-from-last-release, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • correct code snippets #77581
    community-contribution
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid duplicated read #77577
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion` #77576
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Use char helpers for ASCII portion of Regex character class matching #77604
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Avoiding printing twice variable live range #77447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests for NativeAOT #77522
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update globalconfigs with recently added rules #77538
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Change HttpConnection.RegisterCancellation to use a strong reference #77573
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix support for debugging wasm debugger tests with VSCode #77148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Updated resource EndSilenceOutOfRange (#77598) #77599
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Ensure delayed initialization of JsonArray/JsonObject is thread-safe #77567
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use char.IsAsciiLetter in the Regex runtime #77559
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [test] Reenable TestIcuAppLocal on Windows #77584
    area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing when trying to call mono functions in a non wasm page #77496
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure JsonConverter<T>.Read/WriteAsPropertyName methods are user-callable. #77488
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix issue with spurious unproductive full GC which led to OOM. #77478
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up TarHeader.GlobalHeadFormatPrefix #77580
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #77425
    area-Host
  • Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests with one work item per test class #77417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Consecutive registers #77072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #77549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Release/7.0] Issue ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished callbacks for dynamic modules #77533
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Mark and expose additional Vector functions as Intrinsic #77562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Remove Vector128 checks for amd64 APIs #77534
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Move Interop code from System.Drawings.Common to Common directory #77565
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • unify error handling for FileStream and Pipe Streams #77543
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #77448
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove `palrt` from JIT and remove `memcpy` from PAL #77556
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete some unused files and functions from clr pal #77112
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] jest + optimize ManagedError #77547
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Optimize ManagedError ctor and (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Green Thread Experiment #2057
  • [Green Threads] Various helper calls do not transition to the OS thread #2051

PullRequests

Created

  • Swap to OS thread for special cases #2060

Merged

  • allow TYP_STRUCT for GT_RETURN - special case CNS_INT 0 initialization #2059

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • New helper for green thread stack segments #2056

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 17.4.0 Preview 4.0 or 5.0: Cannot publish console app referencing netstandard2.0 lib as ready-to-run or single-file #28812
  • The "--use-current-runtime" option doesn't work correctly in Arm-based musl system (Alpine) #28809
  • Align command descriptions for `dotnet workload` subcommands with other CLI commands #28808
  • One common output folder #28803
  • CanInstallRemoteNuGetPackage_LatestVariations failed in CI #28802
  • DoNotShowDeprecationMessage_WhenNewCommandIsUsed failed in CI #28801

Closed

  • Launching with `dotnet run &` fails to run in background on Linux #10498
    Discussion
  • Update the help text of `dotnet workload list` #28807
  • [Compiler / Analyzer Bug] -- Types leak across projects in a single solution #28791

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect Corrupt Solution File in Dotnet Sln Add #28811
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Allow null-conditional operators and null-coalescing operators to be overloaded #6619
  • Proposal: by-ref struct operator parameters #6628
  • Ability to create generic types with default containing type? #6626
  • Language support for KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> struct and tuple mappings #6624
    Backlog
  • `using` declaration on any block #6622
  • tuples and disposable objects #6620
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Single Function Classes #6616
  • Strange nameof() expression behavior over alias-qualified references #6614
  • Proposal: move #6611

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic classifier: Unreachable exception in TextDocumentStates #65094
  • Codegen of System.Nullable `is null` check is poor #65091
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException is shown at the next line #65087
  • When CInt( string value) is used as with Select Case you get IDE0004 #65084
    Backlog
  • `AddImportsAnnotation` doesn't match existing line endings #65081

Closed

  • Hot path method is not checking CancellationToken #19464
    Backlog
  • EditorFeatures (non-WPF) is importing ISignatureHelpBroker which it shouldn't #23183
    Backlog
  • add struct as file template. #23157
    Backlog
  • local functions are not supported by SyntaxGenerator #22918
    Backlog
  • add unit tests for ISymbolSearchService and its related interfaces #22808
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException after upgrading from 1.2.1 -> 2.3.1 #22710
    Backlog
  • Random hang during shutdown #22613
    Backlog
  • Moving variable close to use can add more than one blank line #22530
    Backlog
  • C# "prefer inferred tuple element names" option change is not effective immediately #22529
    Backlog
  • Roslyn suggests conflicting IDE0044/IDE0064 code fixes #59577
    Backlog
  • Find All References on a definition finds all usages of any implicit interface method and all their implementations #22509
    Backlog
  • Metadata view should not show wellknown/embedded attributes #22453
    Backlog
  • No mapping for `private protected` in EnvDTE.vsCMAccess #22406
    Backlog
  • High allocations in ProcessMultilineComment (TODO comment processing) #22398
    Backlog
  • Indent Guides show up between using directives #22328
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Structure.StructureTaggerTests.CSharpOutliningTagger_RegionIsNotDefinition seems to be flakey #22277
    Backlog
  • [Question] How to use EditorFeatures code in my own C# text editor? #22260
    Backlog
  • Flaky test failure PersistentService_Solution_WriteReadSameInstance #22230
    Backlog
  • use new telemetry PII API so that we dont need to do custom hash for PII info #22204
    Backlog
  • AbstractCodeActionOrUserDiagnosticTest.TestMissingInRegularAndScriptAsync(...) forcibly sets ParseOptions to null #22181
    Backlog
  • Use new telemetry API to send unhashed data for internal users #22101
    Backlog
  • Navigate To doesn't highlight search term in results correctly if the matched string is longer than the search term #21888
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb in class lib project should recommend adding package references to correct NuGet packages instead of an assembly ref #21859
    Backlog
  • Contents of anonymous types aren't simplified #21603
    Backlog
  • move back to ImmutableArray once json.net issue is solved #21498
    Backlog
  • Convert to Interpolated String Quick Action sometimes casts to object #21427
    Backlog
  • Use block body throws out whitespace #21341
    Backlog
  • ServiceHubRemoteHostClient+WorkspaceHost.OnSolutionAdded hang loading Roslyn.sln #21166
    Backlog
  • Aliased type not colored in intellisense #21118
    Backlog
  • [suggestion] Convert if to switch should be available for else if, etc #21100
    Backlog
  • Operator nameof is incorrectly highlighted in red #21071
    Backlog
  • Duplicate "case" when doing if->switch conversion #20981
    Backlog
  • ObjectDisposedException in OOP. #20965
    Backlog
  • OOM while navigating around solution #20963
    Backlog
  • Would like some way to decide if an analyzer should run on on syntax tree at all. #20736
    Backlog
  • ISyntaxFactsService.IsEntirelyWithinStringOrCharOrNumericLiteral returns false for numeric literals in C# #20594
    Backlog
  • Devenv.exe and servicehub.XXX.exe are taking up 100% cpu for minutes. #20559
    Backlog
  • Reloading Roslyn.sln solution takes 5+ minutes. #20553
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Request to add a new text tag. #20477
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Need a way to control override completion #20474
    Backlog
  • FAR: Group headers should not count no results as a result #20259
    Backlog
  • Error List Sorting doesn't sort anymore #20248
    Backlog
  • Signed builds are taking longer than they should #18008
  • AbstractCompletionProviderTests.CreateWorkspace is confusing #19901
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] FileSystem absraction in MSBuildWorkspace #19891
    Backlog
  • Strange naming suggestion when you return a Task<string> #19859
    Backlog
  • CodeLens Show References causes OOP to run out of memory #19767
    Backlog
  • GenerateEqualsAndGetHashCodeFromMembersCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error #19749
    Backlog
  • Completion shows snippets after using #19639
    Backlog
  • Convert string to Func? #19569
    Backlog
  • Suggest using method group references instead of explicitly-cached delegates #19459
    Backlog
  • Go to Definition from C# to F# shows VB Metadata #19031
    Backlog
  • quickwatch fails on valid expression #18908
    Backlog
  • Productivity: IntelliSense should provide values in configuration files (app.config/appsettings.json) #18866
    Backlog
  • IOperation - don't understand the end-to-end story #19014
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete prefers case insensitive match #19012
    Backlog
  • Warning that Interactive is too slow #18961
    Backlog
  • [Suggestion] Default Grouping Collapse/Expand Behavior in FAR with interfaces #18643
    Backlog
  • report which document FAR is initiated in FAR telemetry #18327
    Backlog
  • Async and while(true) loop: can't properly step to top of while loop #17773
    Backlog
  • IDE0075: GetCurrentNode returned null #62827
    Backlog
  • Annoying auto-completion when typing local function with generic return #17426
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: replacing switch statement with switch expression deletes preceding comments #61278
    Backlog
  • IDE0065: Global usings must not be places inside namespace #61773
    Backlog
  • Simplifier reduces generic Array.BinarySearch<T>() to boxed Array.BinarySearch() #10840
    Backlog
  • No intellisense (due to unknown type) for delegate arguments #16555
    Compiler.Next
  • Public API for IMetadataAsSourceService #16540
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 15 RC - New File/Item dialog #16522
    Backlog
  • Syntax walker doesn't visit using directives in the middle and at the end of the script #16452
    Backlog
  • Figure out why features are requesting navigation to out-of-bounds locations #16365
    Backlog
  • TupleTypeSymbols are not always round-trippable (error type) #16252
    Backlog
  • Should SyntaxFactory.ParseTypeName reject void? #16191
    Compiler.Next
  • No autocomplete after using (c#8 syntax) #40393
    Backlog
  • Performance Test: Load solution #15702
    Backlog
  • BaseMethodDeclarationSyntax abstraction should be extended #15700
    Backlog
  • Performance Test: NavigateTo #15675
    Backlog
  • Performance test: Find All References #15674
    Backlog
  • remove retry once root issue is fixed. #15562
    Backlog
  • Completion Ask: Allow completion providers results to be shown immediately, instead of waiting for all providers to complete. #15301
    Backlog
  • Reactivate the simplify-lambda code-fix. #15295
    Backlog
  • use new TaskStatusCenter in error list for progress reporting #15000
    Backlog
  • Incorrect `IDE0007 use 'var' instead of explicit type` in invalid foreach statement #14051
    Backlog
  • Simplification APIs should return the reasons for simplifying a node #13587
    Backlog
  • Solution lifetime tests are flaky #13433
    Backlog
  • clean up IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #13261
    Backlog
  • Optimize trivial cases of Enum.HasFlag calls #12810
    Compiler.Next
  • make CompilationOptions and ParseOptions to implement IObjectWritable like diagnostics and syntax node #12795
    Backlog
  • work left in remote host client area #12773
    Backlog
  • serialization work left that needed to be figured out before RTM for OOP #12770
    Backlog
  • 'Move type to new file' quick fix/refactoring doesn't work correctly in shared projects #65099
  • RemoteWorkspace work left #12776
    Backlog
  • Inline Temp breaks formatting in certain cases #12682
    Backlog
  • [Suggestion] SyntaxNodeOrTokenList should be a IReadOnlyList<SyntaxNodeOrToken> #12355
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 false positive when we need to box a nullable value type, and we have a cast in place. #65005

PullRequests

Created

  • Semantic Snippets - Fix snippet priority in completion list #65103
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - try catch snippet #65101
    Area-IDE
  • Move net50 ref assemblies to only projects that need them #65093
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not insert equals and colon if the are already present #65090
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve parser error recovery around misplaced semicolon #65089
    Area-Compilers
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65088
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Skip FunctionTypeSymbol's in `BoundNode.Dump()` #65082
    Area-Compilers
  • Attempt an alternative implementation of AsyncQueue #65080
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65079
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Do not offer 'make field readonly' in structs that are overwritten #65065
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash in 'fix all' for 'simplify conditional' #65077
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix completion lists not appearing in a using-statement #65033
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve destination trivia when inlining temps #65021
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve trivia preservatio in Convert Switch Statement to Expression #65069
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not move global-usings inside namespaces. #65074
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use AzDO timeline logging commands #65098
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Change the title for two CodeAction tests #65097
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Add back async streaming of results for DesignerAttributes (part2)" #65092
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue in remove-unnecessary-cast with implicit-nullable-boxing casts #65047
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional cases to match when simplifying delegate invokes #65010
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove ILegacyIndentationManagerWorkspaceService (17.5) #65096
    Area-IDE
  • Make instructions for STE a live region for screen readers #64988
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Complete move to net70 ref assemblies #64833
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add support for invert-if in iterators #65035
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add brace-matching support for block comments #65014
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic snippets - updates option names #64814
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add EvaluationData.GetItemValues #65036
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Log ProjectId instead of project path, so we can distinguish flavors in EnC logs #65068
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fix generators not being added or removed correctly #65039
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Add ExternalAccess name recommender API for Pythia #65075
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a race between AsyncQueue operations #65078
    Area-Compilers
  • Add A/B flag to test removing recoverable assembly-metadata in VS. #64948
    Area-IDE
  • Remove ILegacyIndentationManagerWorkspaceService #65076
    Area-IDE
  • Extend pattern explainer for more complicated graphs #65002
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't directly reenter back into the workpsace when initializing listeners. #64969
    Area-IDE
  • Prefix 'unmerged changes' with 'TODO' #62319
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove "System.Threading.Channels" from vsix #65028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Check escape after converting #64976
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid infinite loop in Find All References #65009
    Area-IDE
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Webassembly .dll files cannot be downloaded #44784
  • Custom Authorization Attributes on Min APIs #44783
  • Blazor WASM integrity check failed behind corporate proxy (Zscaller) #44782

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • \obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #10984
  • App runs fine in Android Emulator or Android Local Device, crashes running on side-installed APK on actual device. #10983
  • Android build compiles fine:Xaml Parser fails to understand the expression when placed wrongly and compiles in release #10982
  • Placing a slider in a grid column with a Width="*" and non-zero Margin causes a LayoutCycleException #10980
  • Visual Studio is not able to pair to Mac after Ventura upgrade #10979
  • [Android] Entry control: Closing onscreen keyboard manually resizes modal page height #10978
    Backlog
  • CascadeInputTransparent="False" is not working on ContentView #10977
    Backlog
  • The name Resources is reserved and cannot be used #10975

Closed

  • Design time type converters return false for CanConvertFrom(typeof(string)) #10968
    7.0
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes after starting creating a file new project for MAUI #10688
  • Crash on startup with XCode 14 / iOS 16 #10705

Created

Merged

Updated
